text: External Links : Apply custom watermark for enhanced privacy.
Folder : Apply watermark on any Folder (files & subfolders).
Grant & Revoke Access All : Added in Item Info.
Company and Discover : Filter your Contacts.
Bold & Italic Messages : Use CTRL B and CTRL I.
Italic Messages : Use * before & after text to highlight as ITALIC.
Data Residency : Added UI elements when app hosted in other countries (being rolled out).
